attributes.additional_details: The legalisation of cannabis and further research and development of its medicinal benefits and improve the economy.
attributes.background: Listen to the people and look at all the many positive medical benefits cannabis has, consider the huge economical gain from its legalisation, considering we export the most medicinal cannabis in the world why is it not free for us the people.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300475
